| History                 = The '''Irakzai''' were a hill tribe of the [[Himelian Foothills|western foothills]] of the [[Himelian Mountains]] during the [[Hyborian Age]]. They were despised as "lowlanders" by the tribes of [[Ghulistan (Hyboria)|Ghulistan]].{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #35|; A Gazetteer of the Hyborian Age, Part IV: Irakzai's entry}} The [[Afghuli]] were their hated foes.{{r|Savage Sword of Conan #112|; A Dream of Empire}}
